actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-756.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 6329) to authorize appropriations for the Department of Energy for national security programs for fiscal year 1983, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 6329 (Department of Energy national security programs funding).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 6329) to authorize appropriations for the Department of Energy for national security programs for fiscal year 1983, and for other purposes.
